c74object.name: o.makefolder
c74object.description: Java wrapper to create folders in a given directory. In this case a wrapper was used instead of a deployer mainly because makefolder.mxj only accepts boot style directories, and a conformpath object is needed.

method.name: path
method.description: Set folder path plus folder name. Example: "/Users/username/Desktop/My Folder" will create a folder named "My Folder" in the Desktop folder.

method.name: make
method.description: Make folder at specified path. If no path has been provided o.makefolder will make nothing.

method.name: dump
method.description: Dump stored path to Max Window.

entry.name: symbol
entry.description:
"failed to create directory at (path)" : co.
"folder already exists" : if the folder already exists o.makefolder will not attempt to create a folder.
"success: new folder at (path)" : if o.makefolder created the folder successfully.
"done" : done creating folder.
